title: Punch
tagline: A Fun and Easy Way to Build Modern Websites
description: Punch is a simple tool to generate HTML documents from Mustache templates and content stored in JSON & Markdown format.
description_html: Punch is a simple tool to generate HTML documents from Mustache templates and content stored in JSON & Markdown format.

testimonials.quote: This is a pretty nice alternative to Jekyll. It looks 10x easier to use and setup
testimonials.author: Oscar Godson

testimonials.quote: Best static site generator I've found yet
testimonials.author: Collin Olan
